query: SELECT 'sites' as type, id FROM sites WHERE centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name LIKE '%Eastgate%') UNION ALL SELECT 'vacant_shops' as type, id FROM vacant_shops WHERE centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name LIKE '%Eastgate%') UNION ALL SELECT 'third_line' as type, id FROM third_line_income WHERE centreId = (SELECT id FROM shopping_centres WHERE name LIKE '%Eastgate%');
